Name: Alex Carter

Alex Carter is a seasoned investigative journalist born in 1983, with a knack for uncovering compelling narratives in unexpected places. With over two decades in the field, Alex has cultivated a reputation for tenacity and a keen sense of justice, particularly drawn to stories that reveal personal transformation and redemption. Beyond journalism, Alex finds joy in activities that spark creativity and engagement with the world.
